summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 25, 2019. It records the official inmate population count by housing unit, including a specific entry for inmate 'MERSEY' (likely Jeffrey Epstein) in the hospital unit under suicide watch.

persons.name: MERSEY
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 89673-053, assigned to the hospital unit (HOSP) with an operational category of 'SUICIDE OR G0000' on July 25, 2019.

events.title: Daily Prison Count and Suicide Watch
events.description: The Metropolitan Correctional Center conducted its official inmate count, totaling 770 inmates. Inmate 'MERSEY' (Jeffrey Epstein) was listed in the hospital unit under suicide watch.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 25, 2019, which is 11 days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Inmate 'MERSEY' (registration 89673-053) is listed in the hospital unit with an operational category indicating 'SUICIDE OR G0000'.
The total inmate population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, was recorded as 770 during this count.
The document is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet, part of standard prison administrative procedures.
The inmate roster specifically notes the date and assignment for the inmate under suicide watch.
